name: ROTTEN CLEMENTINE; DAYS OF MINE
description:
CW: CSA / rape survivor trauma

lin xue is a rotten clementine who thinks long and deep about the days that she should've called mine, but those were taken from him, on a whim, and lin xue is someone else today. 

a  mad poetic recollection of trauma and the girl that became a bird who became an emperor who brought an eon of unluck

part of the LIAR, LIONESSseries
